name: Commit Agency
description:
We are a brand definition, consumer experience and influence agency that believes moments make brands.
When brands deliver memorable experiences that truly connect with consumers, conversations take place that in turn amplify brands’ influence.
Harnessing the power of these conversations at the precise moment in time when brands and consumers intersect is not only the best thing to do, but it’s the only thing to do in order to deliver the kind of results our clients have come to expect from us.
